title: How was dvlsi paper for yall

comments.body: why would anyone set such a lengthy paper mannn!!! like imagine getting 5 whole derivations fr 7 marks , the same quesions in pyqs which were asked fr 10 marks were asked fr 5 fr us !
Same felt so depressing im seeing the total marks the questions were for nd i was at disbelief. It didnt get better as the paper progressed.
